name: Prince
greetingText: Wish you were close by, but distance is sparking my creativity.
wishText: Happy Valentine's Day ! You're incredibly special to me though you have recently entered my life. May your day be adorned with the sweetest moments of love, and may your heart be warmed by the gentle whispers of affection. In this journey we've begun, I feel a deep connection blossoming, one that fills my soul with hope and joy.I send you my warmest wishes for a truly magical Valentine's Day.
